title: Who are F1’s 10 youngest world champions?
summary: Through the years records have tumbled and world titles have been claimed by increasingly youthful drivers – but who makes the top ten of F1's youngest ever champions?

qa_pairs.question: Who was the youngest driver to win a Formula 1 World Championship?
Which team did Sebastian Vettel drive for when he became the youngest world champion?
As of 2023, who is the second youngest world champion in Formula 1 history?
